definitions.definition: Any of various parrots of the genera Ara , Anodorhynchus , Cyanopsitta , Orthopsittaca , Primolius and Diopsittaca of Central and South America , including the largest parrots and characterized by long sabre -shaped tails, curved powerful bills , and usually brilliant plumage .

main_definition: Any of various parrots of the genera Ara , Anodorhynchus , Cyanopsitta , Orthopsittaca , Primolius and Diopsittaca of Central and South America , including the largest parrots and characterized by long sabre -shaped tails, curved powerful bills , and usually brilliant plumage .
